messages.author: vandebo
messages.text: As discussed, we should avoid the race on notification and get config.

messages.author: vandebo
messages.text: Why move this comment?  It seems to be repeated often, so a same line comment seems reasonable.

messages.author: Mike Mammarella
messages.text:
On 2011/05/09 20:38:54, vandebo wrote:
> As discussed, we should avoid the race on notification and get config.

Done.

messages.author: Mike Mammarella
messages.text:
On 2011/05/09 20:38:54, vandebo wrote:
> Why move this comment?  It seems to be repeated often, so a same line comment
> seems reasonable.

I like it better this way, and it's in the middle of the code I'm changing. So I moved it.

messages.author: vandebo
messages.text:
On 2011/05/09 21:10:28, Mike Mammarella wrote:
> On 2011/05/09 20:38:54, vandebo wrote:
> > Why move this comment?  It seems to be repeated often, so a same line comment
> > seems reasonable.
> 
> I like it better this way, and it's in the middle of the code I'm changing. So I
> moved it.

nit:  For this kind of comment, I like the other style better.  The style guide seems to agree with me, but not strongly ( http://google-styleguide.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/cppguide.xml?showone=Implementation_Comments#Implementation_Comments )
